prompt:
Generate surface form variations for entity matching.

TERM: my llc\nCONTEXT: what forms do i need to cancel excluding my llc

GENERATE:
- Case variations (lowercase, uppercase, title case)
- Plural/singular forms
- Common abbreviations
- Synonyms referring to the same concept
- Common misspellings (if any)

OUTPUT FORMAT (JSON):
{
  "term": "my llc",
  "variations": ["variation1", "variation2", ...],
  "synonyms": ["synonym1", "synonym2", ...],
  "abbreviations": ["abbr1", ...]
}

Provide ONLY the JSON output.
response:
